about_the_game: Play "With or Without You", “Sunday Bloody Sunday”, “Where the Streets Have No Name”, “Beautiful Day” and "Vertigo" by U2 on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.
detailed_description: Play "With or Without You", “Sunday Bloody Sunday”, “Where the Streets Have No Name”, “Beautiful Day” and "Vertigo" by U2 on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor:2.66 GHz Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or 2.8 GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:256 MB DirectX 9 / NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 2600 XT
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor:3.1 GHz Intel Core i3-540 or 3.3 GHz Athlon II X3 455
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512MB Nvidia GT 240 or 512 MB ATI Radeon HD 5670
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compliant
